banner.bannerTextOne: A dedicated virtual workspace for teams

faq.bodyOne: Yes, it comes with unlimited time for anyone - as long as you don't have simultaneously three people on the workspace. In that case, you will have to create a seperate workspace for free (which supports up to 3 people) or upgrade to the Pro version.
faq.bodyThree: The dominant competitors on the market are premised on the fact that we will simultaneously communicate at all times, which hardly recreates the real needs for virtual workspaces. That's where we are here to help.
faq.bodyTwo: Yes, the video communication is encrypted under the industry standard Web RTC protocols.
faq.titleOne: Does the virtual workspace really come with unlimited time?
faq.titleThree: What's the motivation behind the product?

feature.subTitleOne: Everyone can access the workspace anytime they like, just in the real world, so you can get things done.
feature.subTitleThree: Track daily analytics spent on the virtual workspace to achieve your personal goals
feature.subTitleTwo: We provide focus oriented features so that you will not get distracted easily

problem.two: to see what's going on in remote work.

outline.solution: We think we can change that.

product.bottomSubTitle: Our data analytics team will track everyone's presence on the workspace and present you with real-time updates for team productivity and efficiency, so that you can get your work done.
product.centerSubTitle: Tired of minutes-restriced video conference apps? Our virtual workspace will be always there for you - just like in the physical world
product.topSubTitle: Ever dreamed of having a perfect experience of virtually working with your colleagues without ever getting distracted? You can now focus solely on your work with the company of others all while listening to your favorite music

slider.titleOne: The people from these teams are
